welcome_message_body: Welcome to New Delhi, the vibrant and bustling capital of India! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, diverse culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore all that New Delhi has to offer and make unforgettable memories.

restaurants.name: The Spice Route
restaurants.description: The Spice Route is a asian restaurant located in New Delhi.
restaurants.address: The Hotel Imperial (Janpath), New Delhi IN, Delhi

restaurants.name: Rajdhani Thali

restaurants.name: Kwality Restaurant

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles domestic flights for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Handles international flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Handles all international flights and some domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free for first 30 minutes, then chargeable.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
